pullRequest.title: Add 'Standalone LocoNet' option for PR4
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds "Stand-alone LocoNet" option for PR4, with a comment in the GUI option to note that an external source of LocoNet Data Termination is required.
Replaces P/R #9186.

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't this string be in the properties file so it could be translated?
